website_summaries.verdict: Those searching for a built-in range hood with helpful features will find their match in this larger model.
pros: Company offers unit in 2 size options
cons: Product tends to be louder than other comparable models

customer_reviews.title: ... builder specializing in kitchens and baths this hood seems fine and works fine
customer_reviews.text: As a builder specializing in kitchens and baths this hood seems fine and works fine, a little louder than my usual products but within what I consider to be normal. I am surprised by the super bright white LED, would be nice to have the option of a softer white. Overall installation was fairly simple, packaged well, and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: James Owrey

customer_reviews.title: May be better option to consider
customer_reviews.text: Installed in Dec 2019 and had blower wheel fail in June 2020 due to plastic key way wearing out allowing fan wheel to wobble and not perform its function Have email into manufacturer on 27-Jun identifying problem and hope for prompt reply Will update up or down once they reply Update: manufacture sent new blower assembly free of charge but it does not appear the fan design was any different from the original. Installed myself and plan to only use the low speed to prolong the life of unit. Have upgraded rating to 3 stars due to great response
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT EXCEPT...
customer_reviews.text: My unit is not noisy like some complaint here. I guess it depends how well it's installed (the way it's secured and the duct air flow) It works well. Great price. We will have to see how long it'll last. * It should've come at least with some clip on U-Nuts * Also had to get T-Brackets for my project
customer_reviews.author: ip74

customer_reviews.title: Good insert for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I build hoods for a living, I always talk my clients into a ventahood liner due to the ease of cleaning and simplicity. This liner I put in my own house due to the budget. It's easily adaptable to other types of mounting rather than a wood cabinet installation. Fan works great, 3 speeds, lights are nice and bright. As long and you position the unit correctly over the burners you'll have no problems with the unit, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Ineffective :(
customer_reviews.text: Hood is nothing but loud! It is horribly loud and ineffective. Feels cheap too, it's made of thin material. Total rip off for the price paid ($350).
customer_reviews.author: Lihi S.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install works perfectly in the frame that we had built.
customer_reviews.author: nikon1955

customer_reviews.title: Hidden exhaust fan
customer_reviews.text: We install this product in all our higher priced homes, requiring hidden exhaust.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Semper

customer_reviews.title: Great venthood and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We just installed in our new home. So far it working great. It’s not that loud. And the led lights are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: great game

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for a 600+ cfm hood
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a 600+ cfm hood . I've used 2 now in my new houses for gas cooktops with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! With reasonable Price.
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for a Hood vent this is the correct one.. the longest you can installed properly., this can fully complete your satifations .I bought this hood and I’m very happy with the quality and operation with this reasonable price. I can give 5 stars without doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple stainless vent
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and looks clean installed above my gas range.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: I like it the only thing I don’t like about it is extremely loud even if you put it on number one it’s loud number three is even louder I just hate to turn it on because it’s very loud
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan performance! Lighting is great too. Several levels for proper adjustment of fan speed.
customer_reviews.author: David a.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I Needed to replace my vent hood of 20 years and this vent hood was what I was looking for. Measurements were the same as my other vent hood so the change out was painless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and functions just like advertised. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very quiet on low and medium. Lights are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Skyline50

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, but loud
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, we have never used high due to sound. It does work well, pushes our exhaust out 30’
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One year after installation it’s making a lot of noise when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Vent Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The vent was better than expected. Easily installed and shipping was fast. Lights are nice and vent was not too loud. All in all great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mohon

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size information listed
customer_reviews.text: The literature didn't give the correct framing dimensions and now I cannot return it because it's past 30 days. It is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly into the small space that I had. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: susan bonenclark

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for this size range hood, works great love the various speed settings
customer_reviews.author: D Shea

customer_reviews.title: works great if installed properly
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling company, and have bought many hoods in the past. This one ( yes, I have read all reviews) is good one ( especially the price) and works great if installed properly. It is not that loud as many people said, just as regular hoods. We build custom wooden extension and it looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya U

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great system.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the insert. It was an easy install, it looks great, easy to clean the filters, the lights are bright, it’ll seriously move some air. We usually use it on the low setting but when on high it sounds like a tornado but it pulls smoke and fumes quickly out of the kitchen. It’s been in the kitchen a year now and we’ve had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: chad m klotz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t always trust reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda worried. I purchased this vent before I read the reviews. I was so worried that the vent would be obnoxiously loud. This vent is AWESOME! Not as load as people are saying. Lights are bright and the vent PUMPS! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brand

customer_reviews.title: It's a Range Hood with an Exhaust Fan
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to whisk away the grease splatter from wok cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kaptain Kid

customer_reviews.title: like this exhaust fan a lot fit it into a ...
customer_reviews.text: like this exhaust fan a lot fit it into a 36 inch fan cupboard over cooktop with minor adjustments. had this for 6 months. wish cover was thicker stainless steel though but it is affordable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sullivan

product_meta.title: Ancona Inserta Plus Built-In Range Hood, 36-Inch, Stainless Steel - AN-1364
product_meta.description: Size:36-inch| Style:PlusSize:36-inch | Style: Plus When your kitchen cabinet design is where you want the focus, the Inserta Plus built-in is the range hood to look for! Made from high quality 430 stainless steel, the Inserta Plus features 3-speed electronic controls with a convenient auto shut-off function. The long-lasting, high output LED lights used in the range hood are excellent to brighten your cooking surface. Our aluminum mesh filters with stainless steel decorative panels will maintain their luster even after many washes, keeping your range hood looking as beautiful as the day you bought it. The Inserta Plus combines quiet and powerful ventilation with a sleek design that blends perfectly with every kitchen design and ready to fit today’s modern lifestyle!
feature_bullets: 36-Inch Kitchen Hood: Ancona Range Hood is made in a sleek in-built design and measures 36-inches in size, a perfect fit in any modern kitchen! The powerful kitchen ventilator features 420 CFM which is independently tested, cULus
Stainless Steel Range Hood: Made from the high-quality 430 stainless-steel, the kitchen hood offers top 6-inch round ventilation, inclusive of a damper. Fits all standard kitchen cabinetry

Kitchen Range Hood: Our hood features decorative stainless steel panels with dishwasher-safe 5-layer aluminum mesh filters, designed to retain shine and luster even after many washes. Designed to look as beautiful as the day you bought it!

Built-In Range Hood: The kitchen hood features 2 x 2.55-watt LED lights – Designed by Ancona, powerful and bright, high output eco-friendly lights are known to last up to 10 times longer than conventional lights

Professional Kitchen Appliance: The range hood has 3-speed electronic controls, a convenient delayed auto-shutoff function, adjustable up to 10-minutes. Product Dimensions: (L x W x H): 35-3/8 in (900 mm) x 11-1/2 in (290 mm) x 10-in (254 mm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
